pkgmetadata.longdescription: # estivalCalibration and optimization tools for summer2https://github.com/monash-emu/summer2Estival provides a simple API for using summer2 CompartmentalModels with a variety of optimization frameworks, including- pymc- nevergrad### CHANGELOG- 0.2.2 Add logprior/logposterior to BayesianCompartmentalModel- 0.2.3 Include tensorflow-probability(jax) for more (and better tested) stats modules- 0.2.4Bugfix (vector priors were not exported to pymc correctly)Add Epoch support to allow DatetimeIndex targets- 0.2.5Bugfix for BinomialTarget (wasn't indexing modelled data)- 0.2.6Bugfix (reference index for models without date returned incorrect type)
